item.title: Mac apps that cannot be opened or files are damaged
item.description: There are two solutions to this problem: System Preferences -> Security & Privacy -> Security -> Modify to Anywhere Open the terminal and enter: For macOS10.12 - 10.15.7: sudo spctl –master-disable For macOS11 and later versions: sudo spctl –global-disable
